description: Defines physics properties of an actor, including if it is affected by gravity or if it collides with objects.
title: Physics

has_collision.title: Has Collision
has_collision.description: Whether or not the object collides with things.

has_gravity.title: Has Gravity
has_gravity.description: Whether or not the entity is affected by gravity.

push_towards_closest_space.title: Push Towards Closest Space
push_towards_closest_space.description: Whether or not the entity should be pushed towards the nearest open area when stuck inside a block.
